price: İbrahim’in şerefli kılınmış konuklarının haberi sana geldi mi?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīthu ḍayfi ib'rāhīma al-muk'ramīna
